title: Can you please tell me EXACTLY which font this is?
content:
Here is a link to a PDF file and I really like the text, so I'm trying to figure out which font it is.

By the way, ignore the url name and its content, this isn't a political question, purely a font-related one.

[http://obamacrimes.com/103008US%20Supreme%20Court%20Writ%20of%20Certiora...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104000643/http:/obamacrimes.com/103008US%20Supreme%20Court%20Writ%20of%20Certiorari.pdf "http://obamacrimes.com/103008US%20Supreme%20Court%20Writ%20of%20Certiorari.pdf")
author: Axmann

comments.content:
In Acrobat, you can always go to Edit-\>Properties-\>Font Tab to get information on the fonts used. (Acrobat 8.1.6/Mac -- this might be slightly different for other versions, but the functionality will be there).

André
